MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD15 postcode area of Berwick-Upon-Tweed. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.09pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Princess Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:46pm on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
